meanings.definition: In a heroic manner; with great courage or bravery.
meanings.sent1: She ran heroically into the burning building to save the trapped kitten.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter acted heroically to rescue the family from the blazing house.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel heroically defended its acorn stash from the sneaky chipmunk.
meanings.sent4: The knight charged heroically into battle, his sword gleaming in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The superhero stood heroically on top of the skyscraper, ready to leap into action.

meanings.definition: In a way that is noble or selfless, especially in the face of danger or adversity.
meanings.sent1: The doctor heroically volunteered to work extra hours to help the sick patients.
meanings.sent2: She heroically donated her entire savings to support the orphanage in need.
meanings.sent3: The penguin heroically shared its last fish with its hungry chick.
meanings.sent4: The teacher heroically stood up for the bullied student, showing true compassion.
meanings.sent5: The explorer heroically braved the treacherous jungle to discover new species of plants.
